scenario.name: UAC INVITE + call
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "98765432" <sip:32@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: sip:[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 10 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 8 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

CANCEL sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port][$1] [last_From:] [last_To:] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] CANCEL Contact: sip:[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 10 Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port][$1] [last_From:] [last_To:] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: sip:[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 10 Content-Length: 0
